steps.title: Capture notes explaining each slow plan
steps.notes:
cmd> python3 -m tools.agent.bus_message --task manager-report --type status --plan 2025-09-17-commandment-tags --summary 'codex-2: slow plan audit – commandment tags' --note 'Latency triggered by OCERS metadata backfill touching _plans/2025-09-17-ledger-upkeep.plan.json on 2025-10-03; work finished 2025-09-17.'
cmd> python3 -m tools.agent.bus_message --task manager-report --type status --plan 2025-09-19-heartbeat-docs-codex3 --summary 'codex-2: slow plan audit – heartbeat docs' --note 'Docs/tests receipts refreshed 2025-10-03 during metadata backfill; automation shipped 2025-09-19 and remains unchanged.'
cmd> python3 - <<'PY' (serialize slow-plan audit JSON)

checkpoint.description: Receipts hygiene slow list validated and annotated
